ARABIC: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'This is the Fire which you denied!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (And told:) "This is the fire which you denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: “This is the Hell which you used to give the lie to.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and they will be told, "This is the fire which you called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “This is the fire, which you used to deny!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is the Fire which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the fire which you used to give the lie to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the fire that you cried lies to!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it is said unto them): This is the Fire which ye were wont to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is the fire which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is the Fire which ye were wont to believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This:, it will be said, "Is the Fire,- which ye were wont to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is the Fire which you used to belie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (it will be said to them): 'This is the Fire which you belied!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “This is the Fire which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is the Fire which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:14] ‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The angels in-charge of hell will say to them: (This is the Fire which ye were wont to deny) in the life of the world. 616
